title: ???? Rate & Channel Manager – Luxury Vacation Rentals (Remote / Flexible Location)
job_overview:
Vivid Vacation Rentals | Sedona & Telluride

Are you a detail-obsessed strategist with a passion for revenue optimization and guest quality control? Do you know how to make Beyond Pricing sing and understand the difference between a decent guest and a dream client? Then we want you at Vivid.

We're not Vacasa. We're not Exceptional Stays.
We're Vivid Vacation Rentals—and we outperform them all.

About the Role:
We’re hiring a dedicated Rate & Channel Manager to own and execute our short-term rental pricing and channel distribution strategy across a growing portfolio of luxury properties in Telluride and Sedona. You’ll work with Beyond Pricing and Escapia to maximize revenue per property, and build out a diversified network of high-performing booking channels: Airbnb, Vrbo, TripAdvisor, Upgrade to see actual info, and more.

Our guests are high-net-worth individuals who expect curated, high-touch experiences. Your job is to make sure we’re attracting the right guests, through the right platforms, at the right price—every single day.

What You'll Do:
Implement dynamic pricing strategies using Beyond Pricing

Monitor and adjust nightly rates and minimum stays to maximize RevPAR

Manage Escapia integrations and ensure clean, accurate data across platforms

Build and manage relationships with top-performing OTA channels and new partners

Monitor booking trends, lead times, guest behavior, and market data

Audit listings regularly for accuracy, quality, and optimization

Provide weekly reports and revenue insights to ownership

Stay one step ahead of seasonal trends, festivals, and local events

Communicate with the guest services and operations team to align occupancy with service quality

What We're Looking For:
Proven experience in rate/revenue management for short-term rentals or hotels

Expert-level knowledge of Beyond Pricing, Escapia, and OTA platforms

Strong analytical skills and a sharp instinct for identifying opportunities

Able to distinguish between volume and value—guest quality matters

Highly organized, self-directed, and results-oriented

Excellent written and verbal communication

Bonus: Experience with SEO, digital marketing, or CRM integrations

Why Vivid?
We’re not interested in “filling the calendar.” We’re here to drive profit, not just occupancy. You’ll be part of a small, elite team trusted by homeowners and sought out by travelers who expect more than just a rental—they expect an experience.

Let’s raise the bar for what vacation rental revenue management should look like.
